author: Xbox
description:
Watch the gameplay trailer for The Lonesome Guild, a top-down single-player Action-RPG all about friendship and connection, published by DON'T NOD and developed by Turin-based Tiny Bull Studios. 

Test your might in intense battles and ambush your enemies with clever combos that grow with your relationships. Build your dream team and fight your way through Etere. 

In The Lonesome Guild, you play as Ghost, a spirit with no memories, in a world consumed by loneliness. As a creeping mist spreads, corrupting all in its path, you must gather a ragtag party of six misfits, each with unique abilities, stories, and struggles. Seamlessly switch between them in battle and exploration, forging bonds that unlock powerful combos and heartfelt moments by the campfire. 

Coming to Xbox Series X|S Fall 2025. 

WISHLIST NOW:  
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-lonesome-guild/9mvw0kf7s32b



SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: The Lonesome Guild | Gameplay Trailer | Coming Fall 2025

author: Xbox
description:
Get a glimpse into the live orchestra recording session for Towerborne's "Back In One Piece" with composer Austin Wintory!


Towerborne is now available in Game Preview. Play today with Game Pass.

https://www.xbox.com/games/towerborne?msockid=16418b70ecbf654205979bc8ed0c6448

About Towerborne:
The Belfry stands as humanity’s last refuge, a beacon of hope surrounded by dangerous wilds. You are an Ace, reborn from the spirit realm, armed with courage, skill, and the determination to protect those inside. Adventure solo or with friends, recruit powerful Umbra companions, and fight to shape a brighter future.

Adventure Together: Venture solo or team up with up to three other Aces. Recruit Umbra companions to join you in battle.

Brave the Wilds: Customize your Ace’s appearance, gear, and weapons. Adjust the danger level and explore a world full of challenges.

Evolving World: Discover new enemies, regions, lore, and abilities through ongoing content updates.

Online multiplayer subscrip
title: Towerborne "Back In One Piece" Live Orchestra Recording Session with Austin Wintory

author: Xbox
description:
Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess, highly acclaimed for its unique gameplay that combines action and strategy with a Japanese-inspired setting, will be updated with new extra content!
 
"Otherworldy Venture” is a extra content set in the realm behind the Torii Gates. While retaining the core elements of the main game, it features a simplified day-night cycle, and endless waves of fierce attacks from the Seethe, offering a challenging high-score attack mode to test your skills!
 
This extra content will be available via a free update on June 5th!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/kunitsu-gami-path-of-the-goddess/9pcwxx0ms15s
